blog http://localhost:1313/blog/posts/2025jan25_agentrss/ -

Use Hugging Face smolagents to grab RSS links from any journal

Here’s a python script to find the RSS url on any journal website. It leverages smolagents and meta-llama/Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct. The journalâ€™s HTML is grabbed with a custom smolagent tool powered by Playwright. Html parsing is handled by Beautiful Soup (bs4).
